page.title: 01Introductory-Page
page.content: {Welshampton}is a small village on the North boundary of Shropshire and has a population of about four hundred people. There is a farm shop,a general store,a post office,a church,an old Vicarage,two garages;both selling petrol,a parish hall and a chapel. {Welshampton}is built on a point where the B5063 road meets the A495 in a fork.There have been at least two accidents on roads in the village recently. The area is mainly agricultural but some people work in nearby towns. There is quite alot of property for sale in the village at the moment,possibly because there is no mains sewerage facilties only septic tanks.Future development is limited by the lack of available building.
